item.description:
Hey hey everyone!!!

Cinco De Mayo falls on a Thursday this year, so guess what!! Party at Margariiitttaaasss! As always, dinner (Mexican) and Sangria will be served. Vegetarian options will be served.  BYOB, bring a dessert or snacky food if you want to bring something. Bring your favorite game we are an equal opportunity game playing establishment here. :)

Don't forget the $1.00 for Nina to offset the cost of this meetup.

I have a shedding machine named Princess for the people allergic to dogs.

Parking logistics: Please park on the side of the road in the emergency lane or at the CVS parking lot. Please do not park in front or the side of my house. Thank you.
item.why: Because it's Thursday and Cinco De Mayo!!!!

group.name: The CardBoard Players Club of Connecticut

item.name: Cinco de Mayo at Margariiiitttaaaville
